isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - REASSEMBLE - INTEGRAL OIL PUMP

step1.para: Replace the O-ring on the front case plug. Seat the plug in the front case bore with a maul ( Figure 209).

figure.caption: Figure 209. Replace O-Ring on Front Case Plug

step1.para: Install the relief valve in the integral oil pump housing as shown ( Figure 210).

figure.caption: Figure 210. Install Relief Valve in Integral Oil Pump Housing

step1.para: Install the relief valve spring in the oil pump housing ( Figure 211).

figure.caption: Figure 211. Install Relief Valve Spring in Oil Pump Housing

step1.para: Secure the oil pump housing in a vise. Depress the spring in the housing bore and drive relief valve retention roll pin into the roll pin bore ( Figure 212).

figure.caption: Figure 212. Drive Relief Valve Retention Roll Pin

step1.para: If removed, replace drive shaft snap ring on the pump drive shaft and insert the drive shaft through the pump housing bore as shown ( Figure 213).

figure.caption: Figure 213. Insert Drive Shaft Through Pump Housing Bore

step1.para: Install two keys on the drive shaft (inset), and install the integral oil pump inner element on the drive shaft, aligning keys on the drive shaft with the keyways on the inner element ( Figure 4).

figure.caption: Figure 214. Install Keys and Integral Oil Pump Inner Element on Drive Shaft

note.para: Place round key in the round keyway; square key in the square keyway.

step1.para: Install inner element retention snap ring in the drive shaft snap ring groove ( Figure 215).

figure.caption: Figure 215. Install Inner Element Retention Snap Ring

step1.para: Install the drive gear key in the keyway of the drive shaft (inset, Figure 216). Install drive gear on the drive shaft aligning keyway on the drive gear with the key on the drive shaft.

figure.caption: Figure 216. Install Drive Gear Key and Drive Gear

step1.para: Install outer drive gear retention snap ring in the groove of the drive shaft ( Figure 217).

figure.caption: Figure 217. Install Outer Drive Gear Retention Snap Ring

step1.para: Install the outer integral oil pump element over the inner element ( Figure 218).

figure.caption: Figure 218. Install Outer Integral Oil Pump Element

step1.para: Install integral oil pump retainer over the alignment pin inside of the case, the bore in retainer facing the rear of the case ( Figure 219).

figure.caption: Figure 219. Install Integral Oil Pump Retainer

step1.para: Install the integral oil pump assembly in the case, aligning the front face of the oil pump with the retainer and alignment pin ( Figure 220).

figure.caption: Figure 220. Install Integral Oil Pump Assembly

step1.para: Install three bolts and washers through the front of the case and into the pump housing ( Figure 221). Tighten bolts to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N·m).

figure.caption: Figure 221. Install Bolts and Washers Through Front of Case

step1.para: Replace O-ring on suction tube and install tube under the case ring and into the integral oil pump. Bend lock tang of suction tube over the case rib ( Figure 222).

figure.caption: Figure 222. Bend Lock Tang of Suction Tube Over Case Rib
